Node.definition: = woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: (one's) horn is lifted up; hence: = process by which humans find new confidence

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans have their mouth wide open
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= particle marking a constituent or part of a constituent as the only condition for the entire proposition to be true

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans
literally: (word) come out of (someone); hence: = process by which words are spoken by humans or deities
= words spoken in arrogance
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans or deities are acquainted with facts, truths, or principles, as a result of experience, study or investigation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state of being broken or destroyed; ≈ associated with hardship
literally: to stumble; hence: hence: process by which humans go through a time in which they are unable to cope with the circumstances they have to deal with

= to tie a belt or girdle around one's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming oneself for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to put on certain characteristics and qualities, such as strength, courage, and aggression

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness
= process by which objects stop existing in this world
meaning unsure
= state in which humans or animals, whether male or female, are unable to procreate
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of destruction, a drought, or God's direct intervention; ► results include weakness, sadness, shame, death, and disintegration, depending on the situation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to bring down|to cast down|to thrust down
Node.definition: literally: to cause to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities cause humans to die and descend into the world of the dead

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
literally: to bring up; hence: = causative action by which deities bring humans back to life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities take over the ownership of land from other humans, which usually implies that the former owners are driven away

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
literally: to make high; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities grant an elevated status to humans in the eyes of other people
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= a person or class of people that lack the means to support themselves; ≈ thereby often despised or mistreated, but being under God's protection
= heap of dung, ashes, and other garbage, ◄ probably located outside of a population center; ≈ associated with poverty and low status
= causative process by which humans take an object from a relatively low position and raise it up
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

= causative action by which humans cause other humans to assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= member of the nobility; ≈ associated with authority; expected to be generous, reliable, and just
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= causative process by which deites cause humans to attain an enduring condition or status, ◄ as if it were a permanent gift
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= literally: to silence; hence: = to be destroy an object so that it is unable to either move, speak, or act anymore

Node.gloss: to become powerful|to grow mighty|to prevail
Node.definition: = process by which humans gain strength, power, and authority, which enables them to do things that others are unable to accomplish
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to lose most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule
participle = someone who is in conflict with or opposes a person, usually involving a legal or ethical dispute

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

Node.gloss: ends of the earth > all people on earth
Node.definition: literally: ends of the earth; hence: = all people on earth, including those living in its remotest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to lift up (someone's) horn > to restore (someone's) confidence
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone else's) horn; hence: = causative action by which deities restore the inner strength of humans

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) ► husband of Hannah (חַנָּה) and Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה) father of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) ancestor of Heman (הֵימָן)
= town, also known as Ramathaim Zophim (רָמָתַיִם צֹופִים) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► residence of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a standard or agreed upon behavior or practice, as characteristic of a particular individual, group or community
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= process by which food is getting ready for consumption by being immersed in boiling water for a prolonged period
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
exact meaning unknown; probably: = two pronged tool ◄ made out of metal; ► used for handling meat
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= each of the projecting pointed parts of a fork (מַזְלֵג)

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= a container ◄ made of bronze, ► for cooking
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam and smoke
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= container; ◄ probably ceramic; ► used for cooking and storing food
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative process by which a substance or other object is caused to appear to move up by itself
exact meaning unknown; probably: = two pronged tool ◄ made out of metal; ► used for handling meat
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by exposing it to the heat of an open fire
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= set of particles marking an object or event as opposed to other objects and events
= state in which objects have recently attained a particular state

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
literally: as (on) this day; hence: = at this moment or as soon as possible
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= state in which humans sense a physical craving for food or alcoholic drinks; this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which an event takes place with force
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= state in which an event has a high intensity
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events, often caused by pride and contempt

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a generic terms for an offering made to a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to be girded with|to wear (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor
= garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by priests (כֹּהֵן) but also by David (דָּוִד) when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

= woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

= long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the tunic (כֻּתֹּנֶת) it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. he wore fury like a robe
= state in which animate or inanimate objects are relatively small in size
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
literally: of days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated every year

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

Node.gloss: to lie with > to sleep with|to have sex with
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with or next to someone; hence: = action by which humans have sexual relations with other humans or animals

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= action by which humans serve a community
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)
= process by which events continue over a prolonged period of time, ◄ described as movement along time
= process by which young humans or animals undergo the natural development of increasing in size and changing physically on their way to being fully grown
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which a deity or human being causes himself to become visible to others
= action by which a deity or human being causes himself to become visible to others
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= king of Egypt
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= substance ◄ made from tree gum or bark ► to make a sweet smell; it is burned in a censer or on an open fire ≈ to provide a sweet aroma pleasing to God
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = state in which humans are dressed in a piece of clothing; ► used exclusively for the ephod worn by priests; ≈ associated with some level of responsibility as well

= embroidered garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► worn by the high priest (כֹּהֵן) over his robe (מְעִיל) representing the visible glory of God; associated with divine oracles as the urim and tummim were kept in a pouch worn on top of it; this garment was regarded as unique and not to be duplicated and used outside of regulated worship
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans offer something to a deity by burning it partially or in its entirety on the altar; considered to have a pleasing aroma
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to kick at|to despise|to treat lightly
Node.definition: = action by which someone shows a blatant lack of respect to something else

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= a generic terms for an offering made to a deity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= causative action by which humans cause themselves to become fat by eating too much
= state in which an object is of a relatively high quality
= a generic terms for an offering made to a deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

Node.gloss: to be worthless|to be insignificant|to be of no account
Node.definition: = state in which humans have a reduced value or reduced importance, mostly in the eyes of someone else
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= causative action by which part of an object is violently removed from a larger unit, with the help of a sharp object, so that it falls to the ground

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: arm; hence: = the ability to exert strength

= a person who is nearing the end of a relatively long life; ≈ regarded as wise, worthy of respect, and an asset to the community
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans watch the behavior of other humans with envy and distrust
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

literally: all the days; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

Node.gloss: to cause (someone's) eyes to grow dim
Node.definition: literally: to finish (someone's) eyes; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause the eyes of others to become affected by excessive weeping

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= to cause someone else to experience grief

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Eli (עֵלִי) brother of Phinehas (פִּינְחָס) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) during time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Eli (עֵלִי) brother of Hophni (חָפְנִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) during time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to be faithful|to be reliable|to be trustworthy|to be true
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to establish a family line|to establish a dynasty
Node.definition: literally: to build a house (for someone); hence: = action by which humans provide posterity for someone else
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= state in which an event is likely to last for a long time, ≈ which can be either good or bad
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
literally: all the days; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= state in which humans, animals, plants, or objects remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
possibly: = unknown quantity, possibly in the shape of a coin; ◄ of silver; ► used as payment
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a quantity of bread that is baked as one piece
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a role in which humans, through a process of ordination (מלא) and consecration (קדשׁ) are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a relatively small quantity of food
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
